+Const =
+  Attr* Visibility? 'default'? 'const' (Name | '_') ':' ascribed_type:TypeRef

+
+Static =
+  Attr* Visibility? 'static'? 'mut'? Name ':' ascribed_type:TypeRef
+  '=' body:Expr ';'
+
